Text:
Ahoy, matey!
How's 'bout ye seed the fourth season 'swell, eh?
Argh..
Thanks. Stephen Fry and Hugh Laurie are both great.
Hi! First of all, a big thanks to the uploader, and a question: any chances for the 4th season???
This would be really convenient as a whole-season torrent. That way people can still download single episodes, but they can choose easily in their torrent program.

THANKS SO MUCH!!

now all we need is season 4 : )
